       "The IMDb Show": Alan Tudyk, His Top 5 Star Wars Droids, and Denzel's Dream Role         This week on " The IMDb Show ,"  Alan Tudyk  ranks his top five droids, we catch up with the cast of  Roman J. Israel, Esq. , and we share our favorite Thanksgiving TV episodes.
